com.orbitz.monitoring.lib.interceptor
Class MatchAlwaysMonitoredAttributeSource

java.lang.Object
  com.orbitz.monitoring.lib.interceptor.MatchAlwaysMonitoredAttributeSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
MonitoredAttributeSource
public class MatchAlwaysMonitoredAttributeSource
extends java.lang.Object
implements MonitoredAttributeSource

MonitoredAttributeSource that always returns a MonitoredAttribute using the method name as the monitor name.

Constructor Summary
MatchAlwaysMonitoredAttributeSource()
          Never sets the result or arguments on the monitor.
MatchAlwaysMonitoredAttributeSource(boolean includeResult, boolean includeArguments)
          Enable result and arguments on the monitor for all methods intercepted.
 
Method Summary
 MonitoredAttribute getMonitoredAttribute(java.lang.reflect.Method method, java.lang.Class targetClass)
